# NSPersistentHistoryToken

**Class**

A bookmark for keeping track the most recent history that you’ve processed.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSPersistentHistoryToken
```

## Overview

You can save a token to disk and fetch history when your app loads based on that token. See [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/consuming-relevant-store-changes#Keep-track-of-the-most-recent-history] in [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/consuming-relevant-store-changes].

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
title: NSPersistentHistoryToken
